name: places/ChIJqapeXQJZwokRKlRO_dbgy6g
formattedAddress: 441 Lexington Ave, New York, NY 10017, USA
adrFormatAddress: 441 Lexington Ave, New York, NY 10017, USA

editorialSummary.text: Chain with housebrand lotions & soaps in a range of scents, plus candles & home fragrances.

originalText.text:
I must say, Patricia is a very passionate employee for Bath and Bodyworks, She knows the products inside out she knows what a person needs, very Caring and compassionate with a lot of
Patience.  She and her other coworker, which I didn't get her name, were very helpful and they deserve lunch and a raise. Now the turn off was the two security guards that kept watching me like a hawk like I wanted to steal something making me feel unwanted and uncomfortable in the store, while I was on my break in my city employee uniform, not cool but I'm thankful for Patricia for changing the mood and her coworker as well because if it wasn't for them, I would've walked out just came in to get a gift for someone but nevertheless, I appreciate them both.... I would’ve gave this a full five star, but because of those two security guards… 4 stars

originalText.text:
I visit this location every so often and it’s always a pleasant experience. I love going in the morning before it gets too crowded.

The staff are very pleasant and helpful. Keep up the good work!

originalText.text: First time visit. Excellent sales team and super helpful without any sales pressure. Really helped me out choosing some gifts for my kids.

text.text: First time visit. Excellent sales team and super helpful without any sales pressure. Really helped me out choosing some gifts for my kids.

originalText.text:
This is my "go-to" Bath and Body Works store in NYC primarily for the fantastic staff who work here. From the moment you walk through the door, you're treated like a rock star! I can't begin to list all the names of the staff who over the years have treated me like a VIP when I shop there but I did want to give a special shout out to Cashmere, who was so helpful and efficient during my last shopping spree there.

Highly recommend if you're in the neighborhood (conveniently located across the street from Grand Central Station). Their inventory is fantastic, especially during the holiday season...

Highly recommend if you're in the neighborhood (conveniently located across the street from Grand Central Station). Their inventory is fantastic, especially during the holiday season...

originalText.text: What a warm welcome. A lovely store with fabulous products. My only minor gripe is with the counter sales staff. When you decline to sign up for the B&B 'program' this lady completely turned in her attitude and became quite grumpy. We tried to explain we don't live in the US and their program would be of little use but she just wanted us to sign up regardless. And so we never got our items nicely wrapped for traveling like the staff did on a recent visit to their San Francisco store. Here when I rethink, maybe we should have signed up for the 'program' after all.:-)  As I said it was a minor negative.  Wonderful store all the same.
